Description.0: Project: Interim Report, due at the start of the Spring Trimester
Description.1: Presentation: Oral Presentation, towards the end of the Autumn trimester
Description.2: Presentation: Poster Presentation, around week 8 of the Spring trimester
Description.3: Project: Final Project Report and Interview, at the end of the Spring trimester. Grading takes account of the overall achievement of the project and all the work completed as part of the project.
